global.error-occured: An error occured. Refresh your page or try again later.

home.home-top-description-title: Vote for topics suggested by others, submit your own ideas or become a speaker.
home.home-top-description: Give your vote to the topics that you find most interesting. If you'd like to become a speaker yourself, submit your topic and tag it as „call4papers” - we'll be in touch soon to discuss further details. Are you interested in something particular, but don't have enough knowledge about it? Submit your idea along with the tag „to grab”, so that someone with suitable expertise can pick this topic from the list and apply as a speaker - just by clicking on the „to grab” tag.
home.login-info: To vote or submit your ideas, you need to be logged in.

login.login-create-button: Log in or create an account
login.account-already-linked-to-email: You already have an account linked to {email}. Login with {link} to link new login method to your profile.

add-form.description-field-label: Topic description (markdown syntax available, max. 700 characteres)
add-form.description-field-tips: Max length of text description - 700 characteres
add-form.radio-author-observer: I want to listen about it (topic „to grab”)
add-form.radio-author-speaker: I want to become a speaker („call4papers”)
add-form.radio-speaker-info: By choosing this option, you're submit call4papers proposal. We contact you, if your proposal will be accepted
add-form.submit-info-1: Thanks for your submission! Your topic will be verified.
add-form.submit-info-2: it will show on the list as soon as it is approved.
